properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_NICK , USER_BIRTH , GENDER , EMAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_NICK , USER_BIRTH , GENDER , PHONE , EMAIL , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , USER_INTRO , PROFILEPIC_PATH , STATUS FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE STATUS='Y' AND USER_ID=? AND USER_PWD=?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ?
